oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Raman Spectrum of cellulose from cotton
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: VISWANATHAN, V
RAO, TKG
IYER, PB
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cotton cellulose
fluorescence
raman spectra
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Complete removal of laser-induced fluorescence in cellulosic samples from cotton can be achieved through kiering, bleaching and repeated alkali treatments followed by hydrolysis.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF FIBRE & TEXTILE RESEARCH, 24(1), 78-80
